about.details:
Incorporated in 2020, Nirman Agri Genetics Limited is an organized Agri-Input Company in India. The company is in the business of production, processing, and marketing of high-quality hybrid seeds, Pesticides, and Bio-organic. These processes are used for different crops like corn, sunflower, cotton, paddy, grain sorghum, etc.

Expanding its horizon, Nirman Agri Genetics Limited recently forayed into micronutrients and Bioproducts. And they also produce non-hybrid seeds, primarily for paddy.

The company currently has production, outsourced processing, and R&D facilities in Nashik and Nimgul, Maharashtra, Gujarat, and Madhya Pradesh.

In 2022, Nirman began to market bio-pesticides, micronutrients, bio-fertilizers, fertilizer mixtures & plant growth regulators under the name "Nirman Agri Genetics".

Nirman Agri Genetics Limited strives at becoming a leading crop solutions provider for farmers by supplying high-yielding hybrid seeds and crop management through micronutrients, by-products, etc.

faqs.question: What is the Nirman Agri Genetics IPO?
faqs.answer:
Nirman Agri Genetics IPO is a SME IPO of 2050800 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹20.30 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹99 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on March 15, 2023, and closes on March 20, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Nirman Agri Genetics IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Nirman Agri Genetics IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Nirman Agri Genetics IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Nirman Agri Genetics IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Nirman Agri Genetics IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Nirman Agri Genetics IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Nirman Agri Genetics IPO opens on March 15, 2023 and closes on March 20, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Nirman Agri Genetics IPO?
faqs.answer: Nirman Agri Genetics IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,18,800.

faqs.question: How to apply for Nirman Agri Genetics IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Nirman Agri Genetics IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Nirman Agri Genetics IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Nirman Agri Genetics IPO will be done on Thursday, March 23, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, March 27, 2023. Check the Nirman Agri Genetics IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Nirman Agri Genetics IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Nirman Agri Genetics IPO listing date is on Tuesday, March 28, 2023.
